website_summaries.verdict: High-sided seat keeps dogs in place, and its washable liner is a plus, though the harness system can be a little confusing for new owners.
pros: Fits most dogs cozily, owners report, with pets adapting easily to its high sides
Liner is simple to remove and wash
cons: Retaining clasps may break after a few weeks of use
Harness connector clip is in an awkward spot
Hooking up tether and harness is confusing for some owners

customer_reviews.title: Perfect car seat for my pup
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it. I was concerned that either he might not like it or that it might be too small, but neither was the case. He loves it. He was a little hesitant to get into it at first go, but after we started moving, he sat still. He really enjoys being able to see out the window of our Outback and it is cozy, but he finds it quite comfortable. My dog weighs about 20lbs and has a long body but fits quite nicely in there.It also feels very stable and secure. Easy setup and break down if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: Helps with carsickness!
customer_reviews.text: The seat took a little while for my dog to get used to because she is hesitant about anything to do with the car. She gets really car sick and I've tried just about everything else. This has helped so much! She is high enough where she can see out and I added some towels/padding so she feels secure and doesn't flop around. I probably shouldn't use it in the passenger seat but i do and it's great to be able to pet her and see her. Also, since the booster is elevated from the seat, the passenger airbag doesn't turn on. She curls up in the skybox and falls right to sleep now!
customer_reviews.author: MHunt

customer_reviews.title: Comfy 7 hr trip with happy puppy
customer_reviews.text: I love this with sturdyness and how easy to adjust the height since my dog stays in the seat better when I put him a little bit higher. I have beautiful 5 month old Maltipoo and he has full of energy but, when he travels with my family he loves his seat and sleeps in there. It is safe with his saparate seat belt that can connects to his hardness/leash. Even though when we make short trip, we don't have to lock him there. Recently, I brought him to long 7 hr drive trip and he had wonderful time with us on the way. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: OperaGeek

customer_reviews.title: DANGER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: watch out. if your dog turns or wiggles the tether can twist to the danger point, possibly even to death. i was aware if this and this afternoon very nearly lost my well behaved 11 1/2 year old maltitzu today when the tether twisted so much it twisted and snugged her harness too tight. do NOT ever use this without frequently checking your dog. it is dangerous. kurgo needs to make a double tether so the dig can't turn and twist. this is a revision to my original review.
customer_reviews.author: knittingon

customer_reviews.title: Only reason we made a cross country trip
customer_reviews.text: My 11 lb Yorkie Poo usually can't make a trip across town without throwing up. I just moved across the country and had to drive about 20 hours. Never would have made it without this thing. He spent most of the trip napping and was apparently very comfortable with or without the blanket I gave him. He attempted to jump out a few times but eventually realized he couldn't because of the clip. This thing is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Could be better designed
customer_reviews.text: I loved this car seat at first, but after awhile the front part of the seat seems to collapse. I think it could be improved by attaching the straps in the front of the seat so it would hold the seat up better in the front. Another option would be to add some reinforcements to each corner of the front so it would not collapse. My Yorkie only weighs 11 lbs. but he tends to put his paws on the front of the seat and gradually he has pushed it down. The back stays up good, but the front is only about half the height of the back.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Worked ok, dog got out of it.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this for our Chihuahua because she hates to ride in the car and I thought this would be a great alternative to her jumping back and forth between the front and back seats and being so anxious. The car seat was easy to install and fit great in the back of my 2018 Equinox. Unfortunately, she managed to get out of it. I need to try it again with it being in the front seat so she can see out the window and be sitting next to me. If your dog isn't super anxious, this would probably work. But our was determined to get out of it and she did.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle D

customer_reviews.title: Secure seat for your furball!
customer_reviews.text: Benny, 20lb pug, fits! Bought this used via Amazon Warehouse and it came in great condition. Like another reviewer mentioned, the sides/arms of the carrier are HARD so to make it more comfortable for him, I bought a pool noodle from the dollar store and sliced it up to fit on the Kurgo. He likes to rest his little head on it when he's tired, and although he's on the higher end of the weight maximum, there's still enough room for him to curl into a ball if he'd like. He tried escaping several times but the restraint firmly held him in place. Another great product, Kurgo. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Hold on, Bella!
customer_reviews.text: Bella got to try out her new car seat today for the first time. Although she was very nervous when I plopped her into it, it only took a couple moments for her to realize she could see and she was safer. I had taught her what to do when I said , “hold on, Bella,” before having the car seat and she was good about clinching her feet to stay steady. On this she won’t have to worry and she’s at a height that makes it easy for me to see her and touch her. It is a big relief for me and I think we will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L. Collier

customer_reviews.title: Great Booster Seat!
customer_reviews.text: This booster seat is fantastic! Easy to install in front or back of our mini van. Like other reviewers noted the carabiner clip is too thick to attach to our puppy's harness but it was an easy fix, just used a smaller one. She loves being able to look out the window and plenty of room for her to curl up and sleep. For reference she's 12 pounds and very long but this skybox seat is the perfect size for her. Love that it collapses and fold flat when not in use to store more easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L Sahagian

customer_reviews.title: Love the Skybox!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Love! The Skybox! We have a 15 pound poodle mix (Steve) and he fits perfectly in this seat. Most of the time he sits up to look out the window, but he also has room to lie down in it. The box is sturdy and keeps Steve from trying to get in my lap while I'm driving and his harness attaches to the box and the seatbelt to keep him safe. The Skybox easily attaches to the passenger seat and it hangs from the headrest which keeps the airbag from turning on. I would recommend this product to anyone with a small dog.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H.

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: My 8 pound mutt first got his legs twisted in the strap (the one that attaches the hook to his halter). I thought it was just a fluke. This morning he started choking on our way to the vet - he had his whole head through the strap! We almost had an accident trying to pull over on a snowy road. This is a serious design flaw, picture attached.
customer_reviews.author: italian cook

customer_reviews.title: Poor design. There is only one piece of Velcro ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to carry a puppy in. Poor design. There is only one piece of Velcro holding liner into booster seat. The wire frame is secured under the fabric with wire tires that have been cut off leaving them very sharp, this could cause cuts in the mouth if the puppy were to bit on it. Have stopped using after only two short trips.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Maltipoo
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the carseat I bought from Amazon because it had been opened and was missing the carabiner BUT I bought it at PetSmart and LOVE it. Works great for my 10lb Maltipoo that loves to look out the window. It took a few days of adjustment for him as he was used to being on my lap but now it's great, I feel less distracted and I feel like he is safer. Only complaint would be he gets tangled and twists the tether, so I am going to buy another clip or carabiner with a swivel to attach to the original.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Thought this was the one but...
customer_reviews.text: We just tried it today. Our dog is a 15lb Tibetan spaniel. They are similiar to a pekingese. She could jump out of it. We made the carabiner shorter and she could still jump out. The reason she can jump out is because there is still slack where the cabiner attaches at the seatbelt.
customer_reviews.author: John Guzik

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves her car seat
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this car seat. She sits up high enough to see out of the window (we have a mini van) and yet she can still curl up and take a nap if she chooses. I also like that the seat secures safely using the car seat belt and seat back. I did add an extra pad in the bottom because it didn't seem as cushy as I would like. I also think the top edges could have a little more padding as sometimes my dog like to rest her chin and the edge is kind of hard. Overall, I am very satisfied and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Online shopper

customer_reviews.title: The booster seat is durable and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Sophie (our 11lb standard yorkie) loves her new seat. I bought this model to replace an older version that she had as a pup and has since out grown. I keep the seat raised to a level that allows her to look out of the window, and she loves it! The booster seat is durable and easy to clean. It has enough space for Sophie to look outside during quick drives, or take a nap on road trips. Its great for peace of mind as well. I can put her in the backseat or the front, without worrying about what will happen if we're in an accident.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki G. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Maltipoo Approved
customer_reviews.text: My 8lb Maltipoo is in this carrier for 3 hour’s a day due to my commute. I added a blanket for his comfort (spoiled). Designed for the front side of the front passenger seat, but my photos show it installed on the back side of the front passenger seat.
customer_reviews.author: MotoGPTech

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Perfect seat for my 6lb Chi.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for our long road trip. I bought another seat prior to this one and it was quite flimsy. I returned it and bought this one and it worked out perfect. The clip for the harness was way too big for my guy tho. I ended up using it for attaching the safety strap to the seat belt. I felt that if you looped the safety strap through the seat belt (as shown in instructions) it made the strap really short and my dog didn't have room to move. I had a smaller clip on hand that I used from clipping safety strap to his harness.
customer_reviews.author: WhoLuvsToShop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Car seat for your Furbaby
customer_reviews.text: This is well made, sturdy and so easy to install. It is totally worth every cent. It has a lifetime warranty. I totally feel that my dog is safe in this car seat. She loves that she can stand up and I don’t have to worry about her falling because it has the caribiner you attach to the dogs harness. It will be great for travel because it’s big enough for her to sleep in it. I have a Toy Yorkie and she’s 4 lbs. This holds up to 30lbs which I think could be a little tight but small dogs it’s Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sajeski

customer_reviews.title: I love it, my dog loves it, everybody loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more in love with this car seat. I have an 8-pound Pomeranian who previously insisted on spending car trips pacing between the driver and passenger's seats (admittedly not the safest for everyone involved). She is SO much happier with her new seat. It keeps her calm for the entire trip, raises her up to window-height so she can see out, gives her a safe space to sleep (she's a rescue and prefers her own space), and best of all keeps her shedding hair, wandering eye boogies, and nose-wipes all safely confined in one space and away from my upholstery. Win-win.
customer_reviews.author: Korin

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog took to his new seat right away. We've used it twice so far. When we first got it, I sat it open on the kitchen floor & he jumped in. It's very easy to install and seems sturdy. Our dog can see out of the car from the seat and he's secure in it. The seat has a strap that clips onto his harness. So much safer than riding in my hubby's lap in the front seat. Our dog weighs 14#. It seems roomy enough for him to lie down on a long trip too. For his first trip, hubby sat in the backseat with him, and the 2nd trip he was good by himself.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Berry

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Secure
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. I needed something that my medium HavaPoo could sit up or lay down and see out the window. Even when his leash is connected to the carabiner he can still sit up or lay down. I love that it is all washable and pretty cozy. The only downside I have found is that the metal frame isn't comfortable for him to lean his chin on, which he likes to do. So I just fold an extra little blanket over it. He loves the car seat too! He can hop in and out of it as needed! Great value and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa E Auciello

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 20LB shiba
customer_reviews.text: I have a 20 lbs Shiba Inu and was a little worried he would be too large for the seat, but it’s the perfect fit. I probably wouldn’t recommend to any dog over 25 lbs though. We trained him to sit in the seat with treats with the seat in the house for a few days. Now when he sees the seat in the car he jumps right in! I feel a lot safer letting him stick his head out of the window with this seat, being able to attach a Carabiner To his harness and onto the seat is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great seat to keep your pups safe
customer_reviews.text: I really like this seat and purchased 2 for my small dogs (under 15 lbs each). They like having the option to sit and look out the window and lay down as well. The strap that attaches to their harness makes me a little worried that one of them will get twisted and tangled up, especially my younger dog so I don't use it but they don't jump out of the seat. The little guy has started chewing through the liner so I'll have to check how I can fix that but overall I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: perfect for nervous car dogs!
customer_reviews.text: this doggie car seat is so great!!! i can't believe we waited so long to get something like this for our small pug dog. she's 15 lbs and fits in it perfectly. it's very sturdy and i can install/uninstall it in a minute. the backstrap buckle fit across the large fold down section of our backseat that i was worried it wouldn't fit across but it worked great. our dog is usually so unsettled in the car and with this she calms right down. i also like that you can carabeener their leash so they stay put. would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: L. Fisk

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fact it was so easy to install. I just wish the inside of booster seat was a little higher. Maybe it's because my little teacup Chihuahua is so small, she is having a problem seeing over the booster seat, and that is my issue, not the booster seat :-) I am just going to put some foam and some extra padding in there and I should be good to go. In the pic attached, she got tired of stretching her neck to see out into the world, she had to take a nap. LOL Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.text: This "booster seat" worked well for us. Our dog is small, a Yorkshire Terrier, and he likes being elevated enough to look out. To say he didn't care for another car bed that was at seat level would be an understatement, and I was pleasantly surprised that to see him quickly adapt to this one. Of course, I can't guarantee other dogs will react the same way - dogs make dog decisions, and sometimes there's no human logic to them.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S in Raleigh

customer_reviews.title: Confusing directions and seat seems to be permanently collapsed!
customer_reviews.text: This item came in a collapsed state and does not want to assume full shape. Found the directions for installation confusing--there was a strap across the top too. Finally figured out I could make it work by setting the seat atop the middle arm rest (in back seat) and secured it by securing it under the arm rest with the mystery strap. It remains in a state of partial collapse, therefore not allowing dog to cuddle down in the bed. BTW, I have a 8lb maltipoo.
customer_reviews.author: NanaTech

customer_reviews.title: I am not happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with this product. First, the clip that attaches to the dog's harness is not the clip in the picture. It is a thick D clip that didn't fit through my dogs harness loop. In addition, the clip and loop is not in the same position shown and when my dog moves around in the box, she ends up getting twisted up in it and I worry about her choking herself. The orange fabric keeps coming up and the box does not sit level against the seat as shown. Such a cute idea, but very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as recommended
customer_reviews.text: It has a metal on the top part of the boosted for sturdiness. But after my Pekingese moved a few times and just put his front leg on the top of it (while fastened securely on the boosted with his security harness and seat belted to the booster. The front boosted collapsed forward. AND yes, my dog met the weight requirement as specified on the advertisement. I do not recommend this booster if your dog likes to stand up and look out the window. I got a more sturdier booster and it's been fine since.
customer_reviews.author: 4YPK38

customer_reviews.title: Sophie’s New Ride
customer_reviews.text: Sophie loves her car seat. Unlike her crate, the car seat sits up high enough she can see out and is big enough she can lie down (Sophie is a 16 lb Cavapoochon). I like it because it was quick and easy to install, is easy to get her in and out of and is safer than the crate she used to ride in in the back of my SUV. In fact, I like it so much I bought one for my sister and her husband’s Havanese for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: DKByard

customer_reviews.title: Great quality BUT i dont recommend for a xmall puppy.
customer_reviews.text: Not very deep and the straps that wrap around the back of the seat would be better if they were just a few inches longer. It was a tight fit for the front seat of my 05 Tahoe. NOT RECOMMENDED FOR PUPPIES as they try to jump out of it everytime. I have a 2 pound yorkie and she is too small for a collar so no way to secure her in it. Hopefully she can use it when she gets a little larger. Will be trying it on my 12 pound nine year old westie to see how it works for her.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Graham

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product, but it was not as described. It has an attached tether inside the seating area of the booster. I did not get the seatbelt tether that is shown. The one that I did get won't be attached to anything other than the booster. I am not sure how much protection this would offer the dog. The seatbelt tether would have been much stronger. I keep it since it seems for the price range that it was as good as others available. However, I think you should get what you pay for and not a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: No matter how we secured it my poor dog constantly flipped it and got caught between it ...
customer_reviews.text: No matter how we secured it my poor dog constantly flipped it and got caught between it and sseatbeck.I would Of returned it but it seemed so close to a good thing,we attempted to jury rig it by adding extra support so no I can't be cause its altered.it was dangerous as it as,I worried his neck would get caught. Tried it hanging from seat back like shown and on seat both ways didn't work.my Ollie weighs 21 lbs
customer_reviews.author: OlliesMum

customer_reviews.title: He Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is just what my little 12 pound schnauzer needs to be able to look out the window when we go on car rides. When he gets sleepy, there is plenty of room for him to curl up and lie down. It is safe and secure. I bought a swivel seatbelt tether separately, because he kept getting all tangled up when using the tether that came with the seat. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dog's Best Friend

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, not safe
customer_reviews.text: My dog fits in this carrier well, and it looks really nice. I like that I can secure him into it in case of an accident. However, after less than a year of infrequent use (maybe using it once a month), the straps that hold it in place (the bottom ones that go around the car seat) are ripping out on both sides and I don’t think it will be secure in an accident. My dog lies in the carrier so docilely that I am not sure why it is ripping apart. :(
customer_reviews.author: SeattleB

customer_reviews.title: Wise choice --
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed - My little munchkin likes to sit in it - didn't at first. He had to get used to how nice it is to be able to look out the window.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a 4 hour car ride with my puppy!
customer_reviews.text: Good product! It's great that the tether can be made longer or shorter. If your dog is big on being very comfortable (like mine is lol) I would recommend adding more padding the the bottom and a blanket or even a towel for around the top of the basket. It's pretty thin fabric. It does come with a passed bottom that can be removed for cleaning. But besides that, it is great. You can have it lower and sitting on your actual car seat or higher up if you have a small dog so they can enjoy the view. My 5 month old pup slept in it for over 3 hours! Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Dana McCurry

customer_reviews.title: Mini eskie 17-18lbs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mini Eskie and he’s about 17-18lbs, although he looks a lot larger because of all his fur. The booster holds him up well and he can see out of the window. The seatbelt secures the basket and there is a latch to attach it to your dog’s harness so that he stays in place. My dog tends to stand in the middle console when driving in the car and a few times we’ve sent him flying because of sudden brakes. This is much safer for our pup and will keep him in place.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.

customer_reviews.title: Good For My Cat
customer_reviews.text: I put my cat in it to try to help with her carsickness. It does help. It fits easily on the seat, and you just clip the harness to the car seat. Though, she is a cat, so I had to sit next to her (I wasn't driving) to remind her not to try to climb out. She did look at various things out the window which is what I'm trying to encourage her to do. You know how, when you get carsick, it helps to look out the window. Anyway, that was just the first time and I'm sure she'll figure it out. The seat itself is very sturdy and seems to be made well.
customer_reviews.author: Molly McGee

customer_reviews.title: Quality, sturdy car seat booster!
customer_reviews.text: My little dog loves her Kurgo car seat. She can finally see out the window & be safely secured. Kurgo makes such sturdy, quality products. Only recommendation I have is for Kurgo to supply a smaller spring link to the seat belt tether. She is only 12 lbs. & I had to buy a smaller one. The one provided was too heavy. Now she wants to go with me every time I leave the house! Thank you Kurgo for having my pet's safety in mind when you make your products.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn H

customer_reviews.title: BEST DOG CAR SEAT!
customer_reviews.text: Used a handful of times on various car trips. My 15 lb terrier mix used to get antsy on my lap or in her crate. Once she even threw up from car sickness. After getting this booster seat, it has been a GAMECHANGER. She sits, sticks her head out window, or even lays in there. SHE LOVES IT! WORTH EVERY PENNY. Sturdy & well made also. I like the metal bars which surround the seat. Def will be chew proof.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic 24/7

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I ever made. I used to have my dog free in the car and it was a distraction along with a safety concern of mine. This booster seat is amazing! Hooks right onto the seat and then my dog is secured with the attached leash. The pockets on the sides are super useful too. Much safer option! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Britney Sweis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect seat for my little one that gets car sick
customer_reviews.text: I struggled with car seats in the back but my little one kept getting car sick and vomiting within 10 minutes. She only wanted to be up high in my arms in the front while I drive which we all know is not happening. So I thought maybe if I boosted her up to my eye sight out the windows so she can see better and in front next to me it might help. OMG!!! I installed this seat in the front and it sits higher because it hangs from the headrest. Problem solved no more car sick dog. What a blessing!!! I can't thank you enough!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Super Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for my small dog
customer_reviews.text: This is a great seat for my Toy Australian Shepherd. She is still learning to ride in the car so she chews the seat tether that is attached to her harness. The seat has great side pockets for storing things for the dog or yourself. It is easy to attach and is at a height that allows a small dog to see outside. I thought the oversize carabiner that was for attaching the tether to the harness was too big for my small dog but it was easy to replace with a smaller one. Overall attractive and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Dog adapted quickly!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves riding in the car but I’ve been worried he isn’t in any sort of safety harness. I got this for him and he seems content in it. He doesn’t love change and he prefers to ride in my lap but the fact that he can look out the window while sitting in this makes him happy. It fit on my back seat and in the front. I don’t know how it would fare in a wreck but for normal day sudden stops I think this will be much better than him just riding in a seat.
customer_reviews.author: ttbob

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could have return this but I waited to try and like it. Purchased for my 7 mo cavalier puppy. He hates it as he can’t lay down comfortably. The sides also scrunch down and looks very dangerous but the pup is clipped in. The bottom is not padded well in my opinion. All in all I should have spent more and got a plushed up seat.
customer_reviews.author: bigdogwalker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dog carseat
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Kurgo dog carseat for many of the reasons other reviewers did, and I am so very glad I did. This seat is quality - made well and sturdy. Keeps my mini-dachshund securely inside and that's what's important. I did swap out the included carabiner clip with one of my own. I have a small blanket inside on the seat for added comfort. Yes, I paid a lot of money for this carseat, but my dog is worth it - I have one less thing to worry about as I drive around on busy streets, now. Kudos to the creator.
customer_reviews.author: Dovelady

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This is so flimsy. My dog is in the correct weight for the seat I purchased. I have it hooked up per the instructions, but have pillows under it to support it. The edge where he lays his head is barely padded. He likes being in his own little space or I would've returned it. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad little seat
customer_reviews.text: I really like this seat. My Bichipoo loves riding in it. If you can always leave it in one place it’s great, but I have kids in the car sometimes and have to shift it around. With that said, it really easy to move around. Takes a couple of minutes. My dog is small, about 9.5 lbs. I put a play toy and a blanket in there for her. I like the side pockets to carry treats and her collapsible water dish. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: summergirl

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic deal
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase for my 9lb yorkie! He fit in the skybox perfectly and only whined once when he realized he could not get out. He had enough room to stand up and lean on the door to look out the window even though he could see perfectly from where the skybox was perched. Extremely easy to set up(less than 5 min), bottom was sturdy yet it seems comfy enough that I don't need to add padding to it for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: Design flaws on every major area
customer_reviews.text: I want to say I like it because it looks nice but...It doesn't stand up on its own so how would it protect my dog? It lacks any cushion on the bottom so how does it comfort my dog on his rides? The giant carabiner is difficult to undo- a medium would be much more appropriate and easier to operate so ease of use is a fail. The design for its purpose is a fail at every turn but it looks GREAT! My 8 lb mellow Yorkie/Shi Tzhu managed to twist under and undo the clip in the first 15 min of riding in it.
customer_reviews.author: JeanDucksfan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect booster seat, very well made.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great seat for our 12-pound chihuahua/terrier. It keeps him safe and he enjoys the view! Without the seat, he unsafely runs around the car and tries to get in my lap while I’m driving. Installation is easy if you follow the instructions. Make sure you do a final adjustment on the straps with the dog in it, otherwise it will droop. I am so thankful for this awesome seat. TOTALLY worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Stace

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Once I got this installed my Westie took to it right away. I plunked him in it and he just sat there and owned it like a boss. On long highway drives I put a harness on him and fasten it to the seatbelt but for quick trips to town he just sits in his box. He can see out the window or he will curl up and nap if he is tired coming home from daycare. It was hard to take out the lining to wash it but hopefully I won't have to do that very often.
customer_reviews.author: Tinga

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Booster Seat
customer_reviews.text: I love my Kurgo Booster seat. My chihuahuas are safely buckled in and comfy. It’s super sturdy. The booster is attached to the seat (in my case I like to place them in the front passanger seat). It’s super easy to put on/remove. My chihuahuas are 7.5lbs and 4.5lbs and as you can see they both fit perfectly in it. They kurgo harness was purchased separately which is another favorite of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great carseat
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these carseats for our dogs, mainly because we don't always live in the same house, even though they could both easily fit in the seat together. They work wonderful, are very easy to clean, and simple to put in and remove from a car (both front seat or back). The only thing I wish was an option for this seat would be a cover. As can be seen by the dog in the far back of the picture, he has an additional carrier inside the carseat to keep him inside the seat as he is a jumper. Other than that, works great to see out the window and has helped greatly with car sickness.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: A must have for travel.
customer_reviews.text: This was not as deep as I thought it would be but we are very happy with it. I love that my baby can see out the window, take a nap or just chill, safely. It was super easy to install and move around. I like the three points of connection to the car and knowing I can drive without distraction! It is collapsible and light, not a big puffy box. Just right for my fluffy boy!
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you can turn airbags off.
customer_reviews.text: Installed today and went to her training class. Much better than having her sit on my lap during car rides. For my car, the passenger side airbag remains OFF because it does not detect weight on the seat. She wanted to climb out at first (but couldn’t) so she finally settled down and enjoyed her ride and was able to see out the window. She is a 7 pound CavaChon and is six months old.
customer_reviews.author: Camping Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: I believe she could ride across the country in it and be perfectly happy. With the appropriate number of stops
customer_reviews.text: Bambi, our Chihuahua/Corgi, has been enjoying - sorry - 'going by-by in the car' in this car seat since July 2016. Yes, she understands English so I do not use this phrase unless I intend to actually go somewhere with her. I believe she could ride across the country in it and be perfectly happy. With the appropriate number of stops, meals and snacks to get us there. It is comfortable and roomy without too much space for her size. She is ten pounds, and is always tethered securely. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gkayemarie

customer_reviews.title: Happy pup
customer_reviews.text: My 20lb border terrier mix was hesitant at first but adjusted quickly! The fit was a tad snug but she fit and even managed to curl up and sleep. Overall, it was exactly what I was hoping for. She had previously been crawling into my lap but this kept her safe and restrained on the passenger side!
customer_reviews.author: BK3773

customer_reviews.title: Safe & enjoyable way for your pet to travel
customer_reviews.text: My 7.5lb Yorkie loves car rides and goes just about everywhere with me. Found it dangerous at times having him on my lap. I love that if I do get in an accident, the frame will save him from the airbags and keep him locked in and safe. He also loves that he is elevated and able to see out the windows. If he’s tired, there’s enough space for him to curl up and lay down for a snooze. Another bonus is that this was very easy to assemble/strap to the seat, and even easier to take off quickly. I advise everyone to get one for their loved pet!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: My puppy loves this
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves this seat and slept comfortably in it on a recent long car ride (2 hours). Seems well built. My only complaint is that the metal loop on the adjustable side of the headrest strap is too narrow for the nylon making it hard to slide through wile adjusting. It's not readily apparent if this is intentional or an oversight.
customer_reviews.author: heyheyitsmarc

customer_reviews.title: Whoever invented is genius. Best purchase ever.
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever. You have to get this for small doggos because look how its up high so they feel up with you so they arent trying to get up higher to see everything. This doggo wants to always be on the mommy, but look he settles right in sky box to sleep or can look out the window or at my face. Makes us both safe! He doesnt try to get out and can roll in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Life saving
customer_reviews.text: Not only has this car seat changed our lives in terms of calming our puppy down in the car, but it saved her life today! We were the first car hit in a 5 car pileup and I am so thankful she was strapped into her booster seat! The impact was so forceful that she was thrown out of the basket, but she was securely attached in her seat. She could have flown out the window if it hadn’t been for this seat!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel K

customer_reviews.title: Mom, I can't get comfortable!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So this little doggie car seat is sturdy enough but I must say not comfortable at all. There is very little padding and my Chiweenie has to lay her head on the metal rod with only a thin nonpadded fabric covering it. Unless she is sitting up - it is beyond uncomfortable. I will add blankets or towels to add some cushion. Also, I wish it was a tad bit longer and not quite so deep. Disappointed for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JWitt

customer_reviews.title: Great for short distances.
customer_reviews.text: My westie LOVES to look out of window and enjoys car rides. Shes about 12-13lbs and we got this for her for our weekend 3hr roundtrip drive. But 20 mins in...she was still just sitting like a statue and seemed uncomfortable. We did test it beforehand by having her lay in it to see and it was a littlllle~ tight but i guess there was simply not enough room for her to get into that position. I think if its a short drive/ errands - it’s perfect. But for longer drives - id say forget it unless best friend is >12lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: great product and save for my little pomeranian. Very safe!!!! and comfortable!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My little Pomeranian had a really bad problem with motion sickness in the car. So much so that he dreaded going somewhere because he would always get sick. So I found this car seat, it is perfect for him, he is secured in and the seat belt secure this to the car seat so he is secured in 4 ways so it is very safe and now he really enjoys going places with me. Love this car seat, He sets in there and just enjoys the view, and there are pockets on the outside of it to put things in it for him. Wonderful produect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Puts my mind at ease in the car
customer_reviews.text: Fits well on my passenger seat or the back seats. Restraint directions pictures are a little confusing but I think I figured it out. Klaus still tries to squirm out of the seat to be on my lap but this puts my mind at ease.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: I took one star off because the top frame is not as sturdy as described
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two pet boosters in black and light blue. Quality is ok, I took one star off because the top frame is not as sturdy as described. I will be watching my chihuahuas for safety to make sure it does not collaspe on them during trips. The bottom has a piece of cardboard under the lining which is very cheap so I will replace this with a better item. The straps and buckle are long enough which I appreciate. The tether is heavy duty. Why did the company take short cuts on the overall frame is beyond me. Will not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Stockman

customer_reviews.title: nice skybox
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy small dog skybox. My dog has gone through 4 of these to date and he is a little dog. He gets excited when we go through drive thrus so he repeatedly jumps on the arm rest, to the back seat, to the back window, back through and on his car seat. They eventually tear or the bottoms fall out. So I got this one. It is well made. I like the buckles . . . you flip, insert and pull. Neat take on that. My dog didn't have an adjustment period either. He knew what it was and how to lie down in it too.
customer_reviews.author: S. T. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Easy to install. Sturdy. My dog is safely comfortable lying down on a long trip. She can also sit up and look out the window when she knows we are going somewhere special, like the dog park. The side pocket is perfect for storing her extendable lead and "good neighbor bags" for potty stops. My dog weighs under 10 pounds, but I believe the carseat would comfortably hold a somewhat larger dog. I also found that I did not have to remove the carseat if I have a human passenger because the carseat folds up against the passenger seat enough that a rider can sit back and wear the seatbelt for a short distance.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Gloria

customer_reviews.title: On the way to 5 stars...then one of the straps almost breaks off completely
customer_reviews.text: I have no intention of complaining about a company whose products I enjoy. And I will continue to buy a Kurgo Skybox Seat for Tipsy, my 10 pound maltese. I've tried other dog seats before, but I especially liked this one. I'm just disappointed one of the straps tore so soon. I only take my dog out in my car once a week. The booster seat only lasted 4 months. But until I can find a better Booster seat for my dog, I will continue to purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: David N.

customer_reviews.title: Happy dog, happy me!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 20 lbs. and just barely fits but is so much calmer in the car using this seat. She is close by and I can pet her but she is safely tethered. The design keeps it suspended above the seat of the car so it does not trigger the air bag sensor, which is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: BluesyGal

customer_reviews.title: Great booster, wish it had an easier clip in system to the harnesses
customer_reviews.text: I really wish this was about $10 cheaper. Both my dogs fight over this dog seat even tho they have two... the other one I have is a booster and looks like a little couch but this one allows them to look out the window. I just wish it was more clip in friendly. I find they clip to be too big and frumpy for smaller dogs it weighs them down a bit. Everything else about this seat is great!
customer_reviews.author: Rios

customer_reviews.title: The dog's Sky Box.
customer_reviews.text: I call this the dog's Sky Box. He loves it since he can sit in it and see out the window. He is only 12 pounds, so weight isn't a problem with his. He has only tried once to get out. I did purchase it with the thought that he might be safer in it, rather than standing on the center console, and it is certainly safer, however, if I was in an accident, I think he might get catapulted out and then choked on the harness/collar, so I don't hook him in. Finally, the passenger air bag turns off when he rides, probably something to do with his weight.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Pup loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! At first she would get tangled up since the hook for the harness is pretty big but it was easy to replace with a smaller clasp. This has saved our leather seats and she loves being higher up to see out the window.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Moehlman

customer_reviews.title: Great for a cockpit dog
customer_reviews.text: My Jack Russell always got into the front passenger seat of my Subaru for any trip. She saw nothing, except the inside of the car. Then I purchased the Kurgo Skybox. Now, my dog has gone from passive, clueless passenger, to my active co-pilot. She can finally see the world passing by. When she gets tired, she can curl up safely, in her cozy "sky box." Love the idea, love the quality, contains her shedding fur, and the price is fair. Total win!
customer_reviews.author: Arasellen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product & customer service - the item is literally ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product & customer service - the item is literally the same as described as the manufacturer, it arrived very fast. We had a little issue with the product it was missing the tether and as I was able to contact customer service, I was helped immediately. The missing part arrived at no cost to me and with a hand written note (love this) Thanks Katherine - very much appreciate this! My doggie loves the booster seat and it fits perfectly in our vehicle. the product is made of high quality and I strongly recommend it to you. The only advise is to get it for a dog not bigger than 10lbs to have more room
customer_reviews.author: Mavel26

customer_reviews.title: One year update
customer_reviews.text: I've had this skyboxe for about 9-10 months. It allows for my 13 lb dog to see out the window or lay down comfortably. It keeps him from bouncing around the car. He is excited to go for car rides with us. So far, so good. 13 month update--The straps are starting to separate from the box and it's starting to get a hole in the corner of the box where the seams are. It's worked well for a year, but is now falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my dog as a puppy
customer_reviews.text: This car seat was great for my dog as a puppy - she loved to be able to look out as we drove but often just fell asleep. I didn’t think it was the most cozy, but she was young and fell asleep anywhere. As she got bigger I couldn’t use this anymore. She know just sits in the actual car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Nannie D.

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: Its okay, it was easy to install. It's cute the only think my dog is a 5pound yorkie and it was a little big 4 her. So I put a small bed pilliow inside and it was perfect... My dog just hates it, bcas she rather be on my shoulders. So she barked the whole time she was in the carseat. But at least shes safe
customer_reviews.author: BeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Puppers loves to go for rides!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our Frenchie when he was a little puppy, 5lbs, he is now 18lbs and still fits! It sits up high so he can see out of the window. You fasten the safety snap to their collar to keep them secure. It was a great purchase. I take Dutch everywhere with me! Can’t imagine traveling without it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Ford

customer_reviews.title: Good look, easy to install, just not for our chew-crazy girl!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this so well, until my chewer pup practically chewed it apart! If your dog is not as chew-crazed as mine, this is a great carrier. Sadly, our little Cavalier puppy chewed through the front cover (orange edging) that covers the frame. I’m afraid to continue using it. Afraid she could cause the fabric “bag” to fall completely off of the frame.
customer_reviews.author: CJ girlfriend

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this seat. It keeps my pup contained and safe while we're on the road. From home to Petco or on a 7 hour drive, he's happy to sit or sleep in his spot. He has enough room to maneuver without getting out of the basket, and we can adjust the height so he can easily look out the window. He can even stick his head out a little, but not far enough to be worry some. Set up was super easy and it keeps it stuck in place super well.
customer_reviews.author: Tehryn & Alex VanSickle

customer_reviews.title: Ripped After 2 Uses
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product since Kurgo has a good reputation for quality. Got it in and immediately put it to use for my 15 lb Dachshund. He loved it! During the second use I noticed that the basket was tilting down a little bit. My initial thought was the straps had loosened a little bit. Unfortunately upon getting home I noticed that the front right corner had ripped about halfway down. I believe the product is rated for 30-35 lbs. It was surprising to see it ripped after two uses with my 15 lb dog.
customer_reviews.author: David Ives

customer_reviews.title: Needs a little tweeking
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Not enough padding around the top edge though. Its uncomfortable for my puppy to prop herself up. Solved that by slicing a pool noodle and put it on the edges! Needs a smaller carbine for the safety belt and it needs to swivel. After all the tweaks, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 20 lb dog. Wouldn't use it for dogs that are heavier.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I've purchased. I place it over the front passenger seat & my dog gets to sit up high and look out the window (she also curls up in it and falls asleep). People always smile & laugh when they look over and see her in it. The insert is machine washable and the product is made really well. They've made some improvements in the design since the first one I bought. Oh, and it comes with a lifetime warranty, so keep the paperwork that comes with it!
customer_reviews.author: The Ultimate Consumer!

customer_reviews.title: New Ride for the Furkid
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and gave our Shiba Inu a better vantage point to see while driving. Only downside is it isn't big enough for her to lay down in only stand which makes her get a little fidgety on long drives.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Puppy Product!
customer_reviews.text: Well, my puppy does look really cute sitting in here. I wouldn't say that she actually loves sitting in here she would prefer to sit on my lap however, this is a much better spot for her as far as safety goes. This product is nice, well made, heavy duty, sturdy and I also like that there's a hook to hook your dog's harness on to it so that they don't jump out of the basket. It's so easy to attach to your car seat whether in the front or back😊
customer_reviews.author: Mayumi Muller

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but short lived
customer_reviews.text: Good car seat...but not long lasting. I’ve had this seat for about 2 years, but this week, it broke. The strap that wraps around the seat headrest split in half. I was hoping for a longer lasting product. What makes me especially nervous is the idea that this could’ve snapped with my dog in the seat, during an accident, defeating it’s purpose entirely
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Erin

customer_reviews.title: This box is great. I watched the video which is quite helpful ...
customer_reviews.text: This box is great. I watched the video which is quite helpful and then installed it. My dog likes it. She is 10 pounds. She can lay down in it comfortably. The only thing I notice is if I use the carabiner as instructed around the seat belt, she can get out of the box...not too far but she can get out. Wonder if I am doing something wrong? Anyway, my dog loves it because she can see everything and doesn’t have to be in a carrier
customer_reviews.author: DebraBangor

customer_reviews.title: Size suggested by Mfg is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Its fairly well made, but DO NOT go solely on the weight requirement. It says its for dogs up to 20 pounds. I bought it for my dog who ways 18 pounds, but he is also 16” long. The only way he could sit in it was if he curled up in it, which was not comfortable. Also, he jumped out of it, while I was driving, and I had to pull over to detach him from the harness clip so he wasn’t just hanging there. Unfortunately, I am stuck with it because the window to return it closed.
customer_reviews.author: splinky48

customer_reviews.title: Felt safe using this product
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn’t like the car seat (I think she’s scared of looking out the window), but personally it gives me a huge peace of mind. She’s locked in so she can’t climb out and the seat is pretty securely fastened and doesn’t sway. The bottom hasn’t caved yet like I’ve read on some other reviews but my dog is only 12 pounds right now. I assume as she gets bigger and heavier I wouldn’t be able to use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Yuan Lin

customer_reviews.title: BEST SMALL DOG CAR SEAT
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality made booster seat for a small dog---------My recommendation would be for dogs up to 15 lbs at most. Best for up to 10 lbs My Yorkie is 6 !/2 lbs and it's perfect. The height is adjustable and it feels secure. He curls up and goes to sleep------or sits to look out the window. Love the convenient side pockets for leash, collapsible water dish and treats. Each of the small front pockets holds a roll of clean up bags. This seat is easy to instal/remove and because it is elevated off the car's seat you still have room for your own stuff. I compared many, many before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: LEO

customer_reviews.title: Good for 12 pound terrier mix.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has always gotten very stressed when traveling in our cars. We just purchased this to use in our Winnebago RV and he acclimated to this quite fast. We installed it about mid-height on the seat and he has the ability to look out the windows. He also tends to watch out the front windshield. We've taken him on 5 hour trips and he's been fine. Just wish it was about 2-3 inches wider. He is able to lie down, but is a bit cramped.
customer_reviews.author: MusicLover

customer_reviews.title: Great small dog skybox
customer_reviews.text: Bought for use with our miniature dachshund who is currently about 8 pounds. She seems to enjoy riding in it with a blanket and toys. Clasp provided is way to big for harness attachment so swapped with a smaller clasp that works great. Could be more stable as it has a tendency to collapse but once you get it adjusted it seems stable. Keeps her raised and able to look around. Great way to travel.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Soukup

customer_reviews.title: Safety Hazard; Belts Broke!!
customer_reviews.text: The belts went completely brittle and snapped! Luckily, I was just loading up my dog and not driving while this happened, but still. We got 5 years of use out of this product, but I am horrified the belt frayed and snapped like it did. My dog is 9lbs and we used the seat lightly, so there is no reason it should have broken like it did. This is an egregious safety issue. I’d recommend spending a little more on a nicer one. The belts on this model are thin, and go very brittle easily which makes them prone to breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Olli gives it two paws up!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve always secured our pets using a harness, but when we adopted our 3-month old rescue, we wanted to give her security and a view. She loves her “bucket!” It gives her a sense of security and she likes being up a little higher.
customer_reviews.author: Barefootmom

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit my Bichon
customer_reviews.text: I really thought this would fit my 11 lbs Bichon but it really doesn't. And I cannot install it to make it look like the photo. You'd need to have a very tiny, light dog at the very least for this to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Kurgo Rover Booster Dog Car Seat with Seat Belt Tether
product_meta.description: Color:Black/Orange| Style:Original PackagingThe Kurgo Skybox booster Seat for dogs gives your pup his own comfortable car seat where he can see out The Window and enjoy the ride. The corduroy version of our award-winning booster Seat gets Fido off your lap so he can't interfere with your driving and cause an accident. This dog booster car seat can be in the front or in the back. Installs quickly and securely on either the front or rear bucket Seat. Dog carrier car seat includes metal supports for structural integrity & collapsible for easy storage. Includes zippered side pockets for storing dog treats, toys, & accessories. Holds up to 30 lbs, Ideal for pets up to 20 lbs. Lifetime : Your satisfaction is important to us. We offer a Kurgo lifetime for products purchased new from authorized sellers. If you have any questions or concerns about our products, please contact Kurgo and we would be happy to assist you!
feature_bullets: Reduces Distracted Driving - Dog booster seat keeps your pup off your lap. Pet Car seat gives your pooch a window view where he can see out and enjoy the ride. Removable corduroy lining for comfort.

Easy to Install - Travel dog booster installs quickly & securely in either the front bucket seat or the smaller side of a 60/40 rear split bench seat. Includes metal supports for structural integrity.
Dog Seatbelt Included - Dog car seat belt tether is adjustable & easily attaches to any dog harness to keep your pup in his seat. Zippered storage pockets for toys, leashes, or other dog accessories.
Sizing & Fit - Recommended for dogs up to 20lbs. They can hold up to 30lb, however 20-30 lb dogs tend to have larger body masses & may not fit in seat dimensions. Dimensions: 12"D x 16"W x 8"H.
Committed to Quality - Product comes with hassle-free Kurgo lifetime against manufacturer defects when purchased new from authorized dealer. For questions, please contact Kurgo customer service.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
